summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the Director of Engineering to undertake preliminary engineering activities to determine alternative bridge locations and clearances for the replacement of the Southwest Spokane Street, South Bascule Bridge (West Seattle Freeway Bridge Replacement, Phase 2 Project); increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1981 Budget of the Engineering Department; making appropriations from the Engineering Operating and West Seattle Freeway Funds; and authorizing the hiring of consultants and the execution of agreements.
